# price

**Instance Property**

The cost value of the line item.

## Declaration

```swift
var price: NSDecimalNumber! { get }
```

## Discussion

This value in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideFareLineItem/currencyCode] property determines the currency designator applied to this number. Siri and Maps display the line item’s title separately from the price information.

## Getting the Line Item Information

- **title**: The localized string containing a description of the charge.
- **currencyCode**: The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the price information.

items.description: The localized string containing a description of the charge.
